content.question: Which of the following best explains the similarity between Hutu views of the Tutsi in the “Hutu Ten Commandments” and the treatment of Jews in Nazi Germany?

choices.label: Both the Tutsi and Jews were accused of being in league with communists.
Both the Tutsi and Jews were persecuted based on ethnic prejudice.
Both the Tutsi and Jews were seen as responsible for defeats suffered during previous wars.
Both the Tutsi and Jews were attacked as militant colonizers who had displaced native populations.

content.answer: Both the Tutsi and Jews were persecuted based on ethnic prejudice.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
